jobDescription: Urgent Need - ERwin Data ModelerSummit, NJ - 24 Months (Preferred local candidates or who are willing to relocate) Skills RequiredExperience 5+ years of modeling using Erwin (MUST be Erwin)Needs to be LogicalExperienced modeling from a Conceptual point of view (creating from scratch/general requirements)Understands needs and how to find the data-based relationships within business processes.Demonstrated ability to Interpret models and improve or change those models as desired by businessExperience with creating Business Glossaries and Data LineageBanking experience is preferred – the more the better Please send your resume to anu at intersourcesinc dot com- provided by Dice  ERwin Data Modeler, ERWIN, Modelling,
